result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Peter I Novotny

records.addlTxt: Hearing on December 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Peter I Novotny
Current: 5964 Main St, Auburndale, WI 54412 United States  (Effective: 10-24-2022)
Prior: W20410 WI-121, Trempeauleau County Health Care Center, Whitehall, WI 54773 United States
for Examination under 971.16 (Not Guilty by Reason of Mental Disease or Defect)
Hearing on December 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:16 PM Defendant Peter I Novotny in court.  Attorney Joseph Edward Long JD appeared by video for Peter I Novotny.  Attorney Austin Mogard in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives preliminary hearing and enters plea of not guilty and not guilty by reason of mental disease or defect to all counts.
Attorney Long to prepare order for examination. Attorney Long preserves jurisdictional objections.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on October 7, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
10:23 AM Defendant Peter I Novotny appeared by video from Trempeauleau County Health Care Center.  Attorney Joseph Edward Long JD in court for Peter I Novotny.  Attorney Rose Yanke in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Long states that he was just appointed by Public Defender and he has not been able to speak to defendant. He asks to waive time limits and matter be rescheduled. State has no objection.
Court grants adjournment.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on September 20, 2022 at 10:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Peter I Novotny
Current: W20410 WI-121, Trempeauleau County Health Care Center, Whitehall, WI 54773 United States  (Effective: 09-09-2022)
Prior: 5964 Main St, Auburndale, WI 54412

10:47 AM Defendant Peter I Novotny appeared by video from Trempealeau County Health Care Center. Prosecuting attorney Craig Lambert in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Joseph Edward Long JD in court for Peter I Novotny. 
Attorney Long states that he will be contacting Public Defender to get appointed on this case.
Court questions defendant and he feels he is competent to proceed. Attorney Lambert states that he will rely on doctor's report.
Court finds defendant is competent. Matter will be set for preliminary hearing. Bond is continued.
Cover Sheet for Confidential Records w/ Competency Report
Competency hearing on September 9, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services
Order for Competency Examination by Department of Health Services

10:56 AM Defendant Peter I Novotny appeared by video, from Winnebago.    Attorney Nathan T. Oswald in court for State of Wisconsin.  Peter wishes to proceed with the preliminary hearing.  Court finds cause to not proceed with preliminary hearing.  Peter will be trying to obtain an attorney.  Court orders a competency evaluation.
No contact w/victim or their residence. If he is released, he needs to be transported back to the Wood County Jail and signature bond converts back to a cash bond.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on August 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.
No contact w/victim or their residence

No contact w/victim JCS or their residence. 

*If he is released, he needs to be transported back to the Wood County Jail and signature bond converts back to a cash bond*

9:25 AM Prosecuting attorney Jennifer C Zima in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court modifies the bond to release the defendant for mental health treatment. If he is released, he needs to be transported back to the Wood County Jail and signature bond converts back to a cash bond.
No contact w/victim JCS or their residence
1:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Austin M Mogard in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Peter I Novotny appeared by video, in custody.  Transferred to Br 3.  Bond is continued.

3:09 PM Defendant Peter I Novotny not in court.  Attorney Nathan T. Oswald in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant did not appear in court today due to how he was acting down in the jail.
